title: Live Music Fridays
description: Enjoy authentic Indian live music performances while savoring your favorite dishes. Experience traditional instruments and melodies that bring the spirit of India to life.

title: Diwali Festival Special
description: Celebrate the Festival of Lights with special festive menu, traditional sweets, and decorative ambiance. Join us for an unforgettable evening of lights, music, and authentic Indian flavors.

title: South Indian Food Festival
description: A week-long celebration of South Indian cuisine featuring special dosas, idlis, uttapams, and authentic Kerala delicacies. Meet our South Indian chef and learn about regional specialties.

title: Holi Colors Celebration
description: Join us for the Festival of Colors with special Holi menu, traditional thandai, and vibrant decorations. Family-friendly celebration with colors, music, and delicious food.
